about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a web3 newbie trying to learn and share my knowledge about web3, an INTJ, currently working in an exchange at Hong Kong. I work as a Frontend Engineer, but I also have a passion in smart contract development, and I'm interested in the intersection of cryptography and web3.
